{{also|fisch}} ==German== {{wikipedia|lang=de}} {{picdic |image=Clupea harengus (Pieni).jpg |detail1= {{picdicimg|de|width=300|image=Common carp.jpg|link=Karpfen}} {{picdicimg|de|image=Anguilla anguilla.jpg|link=Aal}} {{picdicimg|de|image=Goldfish3.jpg|link=Goldfisch}} {{picdicimg|de|width=300|image=Herringadultkils.jpg|link=Hering}} {{picdicimg|de|image=Scomber scombrus.jpg|link=Makrele}} {{picdicimg|de|image=Oncorhynchus keta.jpeg|link=Lachs}} {{picdicimg|de|image=Pacific sardine002.jpg|link=Sardine}} {{picdicimg|de|image=Tiburón.jpg|link=Hai}} {{picdicimg|de|image=Trout.jpg|link=Forelle}} {{picdicimg|de|image=Thunnus alalunga.jpg|link=Thunfisch}} }} ===Etymology=== From {{inh|de|gmh|visch}}, from {{inh|de|goh|fisk}}, {{m|goh|fisc}}, from {{inh|de|gem-pro|*fiskaz}}, from {{inh|de|ine-pro|*pisḱ-||fish}}. Cognate to {{cog|nl|vis}}, {{cog|en|fish}}, {{cog|non|fiskr}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/fɪʃ/}} * {{audio|de|De-Fisch.OGG|audio}} ===Noun=== {{de-noun|m|Fisches|Fische|gen2=Fischs|Fischchen|dim2=Fischlein}} # {{lb|de|countable}} [[fish]] {{gloss|cold-blooded vertebrate animal living in water}} #: {{ux|de|Wir haben jeder einen '''Fisch''' gefangen.|Each one of us has caught a '''fish'''.}} # {{lb|de|countable|archaic|or|loosely}} [[fish]] {{gloss|any animal or any vertebrate living exclusively in water}} #: {{ux|de|Ob ein Wal ein '''Fisch''' ist, hängt von der Definition ab.|Whether a whale is a '''fish''' depends on the definition.}} # {{lb|de|uncountable}} [[fish]] {{gloss|food}} #: {{ux|de|Freitags essen viele Leute '''Fisch'''.|Many people eat '''fish''' on Fridays.}} ====Declension==== {{de-decl-noun-m|(e)s|e}} ====Derived terms==== * {{l|de|fischig}} * {{l|de|fischartig}} ====Related terms==== {{rel3|de
